entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -2.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
